name: Alexander
effect: On a successful parry, inflicts a debuff that decreases the enemy's strength, agility, stamina, intellect, spirit, and luck.

name: Bahamut
effect: A successful soul shield increases Strength, Agility, Stamina, Intellect, Spirit, and Luck by 1 each stack. Can build up to 20 stacks.

name: Carbuncle
effect: All abilities that can be used in other slots can now be set in the After Parry combo slot as well. Additionally, a successful parry restores MP.

name: Fenrir
effect: After avoiding an enemy attack with evade invincibility, your next ability will cost reduced MP and is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

name: Ifrit
effect: When activating a combo ability from a normal attack, press the [Job Action button] at just the right moment to increase the ability's power by 30%.

name: Leviathan
effect: Increases MP Recovery and Max MP gained on a successful soul shield or soul burst.

name: Odin
effect: Physical damage applies buildup of a debuff which causes vulnerability to all attacks by 30%.

name: Phoenix
effect: No longer consume a potion to revive an ally. In addition, inflicting enough damage will grant Auto-Raise, automatically reviving the player after being knocked out.

name: Ramuh
effect: Normal attacks will recover additional MP based on your max MP. In addition, combo abilities cause buildup of the paralysis debuff.

name: Shiva
effect: Critical damage causes buildup of the slow debuff.

name: Sylph
effect: Enables you to evade more quickly during an attack. Evading refills your break gauge.

name: Titan
effect: Grants an effect that nullifies a certain amount of damage based on the amount of time an enemy is targeting you.
